Name: Nouns.World
Description: Welcome page and intro to Nouns inviting users to explore articles and various resources.

Name: Nouns.World/explore
Description: Explore articles on completed Nouns proposals.

Name: Nouns.wtf
Description: The original Nouns frontend. Some aspects of this site are deprecated. No client incentives are rewarded when bidding through this site.
Card Categories: OG, Governance, Auction, Art, Playground, Nouns Explorer

Name: Nouns Camp
Description: Streamline governance interface for voters and proposers that also offers a clean interface for bidding on Nouns auctions.

Name: Nouns.com
Description: Bid, swap, and explore Nouns through Nouns.com, formally Noun Swap. This client allows you to not only bid, but explore Nouns held in the treasury and $nouns pool.
Card Categories: Governance, Auction, Learn, Intro to Nouns, Swap

Name: Probe.wtf
Description: Auction client and Nouns explorer allowing users to find additional details about each Noun, and filter by a variety of variables.

Name: Pronouns.gg
Description: View or bid on current auction. Breaks down traits, and trait floor for each Noun. Also displays book value and %-change from previous auction.

Name: Nouns.Game
Description: Play Nouns at Nouns.Game, an action packed client with ‚Äúquick vote‚Äù and expanding feature set including 'Crystal Ball' and the ability to bid on auctions.
Card Categories: Governance, Auction, Noun O'Clock, NOC, Crystal Ball

Name: Nouns Terminal
Description: Data packed Nouns auction client letting users see additional details on bidders and their bids.

Name: Nouns 95
Description: Retro Nouns frontend with a Windows 95 theme. Features being added daily.

Name: Anouns
Description: Frontend allowing users to vote, bid at auction and create Nouns in a Playground.

Name: Nouns Agora
Description: Frontend client built and maintained by the Agora team. Read proposals, view vote reasons, and find out more information on voters and their voting habits.

Name: Propdates.wtf
Description: A place for builders who have passed proposals to leave onchain public updates for the DAO.

Name: Nouns on Farcaster
Description: Follow along in /nouns on Farcaster where community members share ideas, updates and more.

Name: Nouns Animators on Farcaster
Description: A channel dedicated to Nouns animators on Farcaster.

Name: Nouns Draws on Farcaster
Description: A channel dedicated to Nouns illustrators on Farcaster.

Name: NOC on Farcaster
Description: A channel dedicated to Noun O'Clock on Farcaster. Celebrate daily as a new noun is selected. Share art based on the daily Noun in /noc.

Name: Nouns Amigos on Farcaster
Description: Connect with Nouns Amigos community members and builders in /nouns-amigos on Farcaster.

Name: Gnars on Farcaster
Description: Join in on the conversation in /gnars on Farcaster and connect with other Gnarly builders.

Name: Lil Nouns DAO on Farcaster
Description: Join the Lil Nouns community on Farcaster.

Name: Nouns on X.com
Description: Many Nouners and Nouns contributors are active on X. Make sure to keep up with the official Nouns X account: @nounsdao

Name: Lil Nouns on X.com
Description: Follow the official Lil Nouns DAO account on X.com

Name: Nouncil Discord
Description: Join the Nouncil Discord channel where the group votes on Nouns DAO proposals and has an open forum for anyone to join on Thursdays at 10am EST.

Name: Nouns Community Discord
Description: In 2022 Nouns shut down their official discord, hosted by the Nouns founders. In 2025 a new Nouns Discord was created by the community, with ownership given to the Nouns DUNA.

Name: Gnars on Discord
Description: Gnars DAO is a permissionless, open-source community and action sports accelerator built to help athletes, creators, and enthusiasts push the world of extreme sports forward. Find links to their community on Gnars.com

Name: Lil Nouns on Discord
Description: Lil Nouns is a DAO, like Nouns, but smaller and with a lower cost of entry. Lil Nouns own Nouns and not only participate in Nouns Governance as a group, but vote on and fund their own proposals. Join Lil Nouns for Happy Hour every Thursday at 5pm EST to talk about everything Nouns.

Name: Nouns.GG on X.com
Description: Nouns.gg is a gamified community platform started by Nouns Esports. Now hosting rounds for a variety of communities, Nouns.gg has become a place to gamify community interactions and more...

Name: Nouns Amigos on X.com
Card Categories: Twitter, Social, Weekly Calls, Spanish Speakers

Name: Nouns Figma
Description: Figma file with all of the Nouns traits split up by category.

Name: Noundry Studio
Description: Nouns pixel studio that allows you to create and export Nouns traits using the correct colors and exporting at standard sizes for Nouns inclusion.

Name: Noundry Gallery
Description: After you‚Äôve designed and exported a new Nouns trait from Noundry Studio, upload it to Noundry Gallery. Noundry Gallery is a place to add newly created traits and share them for feedback. You can also use the website to create a proposal for your trait to be included in the Nouns collection.

Name: CC0-lib.wtf
Description: A repository of cc0 Nouns content made easily accessible for users to search.

Name: Palettes.wtf
Description: An exploration of color theory based on the official Nouns color palette, created to inspire designers and builders in and outside of the Nouns ecosystem üé®

Name: Nouns Canvas
Description: A repository of Nounish design resources. This site compiles multiple sources you can use to start designing with Nouns.

Name: Nouns on Giphy
Description: There are a ton of Nouns related GIFs and images on Giphy. Looking for something fun and Nounish to share? Look no further.

Name: 3D Nouns
Description: Fun resource that allows users to generate, animate, and export 3D Nouns files! Have fun!

Name: Tabs.wtf
Description: ‚ÄúKeeping tabs on Nouns‚Äù via a set of tabs and dropdowns including treasury addresses, contract addresses, multisig addresses and more..

Name: Nouns.Biz
Description: Information on the latest Nouns contracts compiled on Nouns.biz along with stats on Nouns and a Nouns directory.

Name: Nouns.Build
Description: Create or contribute to DAOs: Nouns.Build was a tool funded by Nouns to allow others to deploy Nouns style DAOs easily. Start your own DAO or explore and participate in other DAOs on Nouns.Build.

Name: Nouns Watch
Description: DWISS collaborates with Nouns to create a one of a kind noggle watch, available in multiple colors ‚åê‚ó®-‚ó®

Name: NounWorks
Description: A variety of Nounish gear, including the classic ‚ÄúBigshot Noggles‚Äù in multiple colors and Nounish Friends toys.

Name: Butter.wtf
Description: Limited edition drops in collaboration with community members.

Name: shop.nouns.gg
Description: Nouns Esports clothing and merchandise including the Nouns Dopamine collaboration.

Name: Precious Noggles
Description: Noggles made from recycled plastics in a variety of fun colors!

Name: Nouns Vision
Description: Limited edition luxury Noggles ‚åê‚ó®-‚ó®

Name: Boards.wtf
Description: Custom printed skateboards in a variety of Nouns inspired styles.

Name: Carbon Kore
Description: Bespoke Nouns merchandise by creative dev studio Karbon Kore.

Name: Nouns Coloring Book
Description: A series of Nouns coloring books produced by community member Messup! Fun for anyone üé®

Name: The Nominal Hero
Description: The Nominal Hero: Paperback book produced for Proposal 271, available for purchase on Amazon.

Name: Quack & Lola Shop
Description: A fun shop for internet legend Quack and Lola. Shop now or watch along with them on various socials @meetquack!

Name: Nouns x Ledger
Description: A fun limited edition collaboration with Ledger. Make sure you buy from the offical Ledger website.

Name: Lavender.wtf
Description: A clothing store with Nounish designers, by community member FattyButHappy.

Name: DarkNouns.wtf
Description:
Simple Nounish clothing, mostly in black or other dark colors.  
DARKNOUNS

Name: WTF is Nouns?
Description: A short blog post explaining Nouns for anyone who wants to read a general overview of the project.

Name: Noun O Clcok
Description: WTF is Noun O' Clock? Learn about the time between auctions, when the next Noun is selected and the daily auction is celebrated. Join in on NOC everyday, forever.
Card Categories: Learn, Explore, Noun O'Clock, NOC, Blog

Name: Nouns Quick Start Guide
Description: Not sure where to begin? This is a curated list of ways a beginner can dive and play Nouns on a daily and weekly basis.

Name: Nounish Videos
Description: Check out Nounish on Youtube! An incredible set of explainers produced by Nounish; A Nouns funded Media house. They‚Äôve made some incredible videos talking about Nouns, the projects we‚Äôve funded, and more~
Card Categories: Learn, Explore, Videos, Intro to Nouns

Name: TNS / Zero Pod
Description: Check out The Noun Square‚Äôs video interviews and Zero Pod recaps of Nouns to get a great feel for whats been going on in the community. You can also listen to the Zero Pod Podcast on Spotify, here.

Name: Nouns Center
Description: The first Nouns resource center with a great series of explainers. Sadly, some of the info is out dated, but this is still a good resource for new contributors to check out. Read through the core principles of the project; it‚Äôs code, the art, licensing, and more.

Name: Nouns Duna Blog
Description: As of March 17th, 2025, Nouns DAO has officially been established as a Wyoming DUNA. Keep up with the official Nouns DUNA blog, hosted by the DUNA Admins.

Name: Writings from 4156
Description: 4156 is a Nouns founder and driving force behind the creation of Nouns and its ethos. These are some of his early thoughts on Nouns.

Name: Nouns Foundation
Description: Before Nouns became a DUNA, it was a Foundation. Explore writings from the Foundation, including thoughts on becoming a Wyoming DUNA.

Name: Writings from Verbs
Description: Verbs is a development duo led by David and Elad, two prominent Nouns contributors funded to maintain and develop the Nouns protocol.

Name: Writings from Krel
Description: Krel is a long time Nouns contributor and builder, most notably for his work on nouns.camp and as a Nouns artist.

Name: Nouns Newsletter
Description: A Noun's funded blog written by long time community member, Maty. This blog covers relevant topics in Nouns from Feb. 2022 ‚Äì March 2024.

Name: Mundo Nouns (Newsletter)
Description: Nouns newsletter started by community member, Gramajo in August 2025. Stay up to date with Nouns through weekly emails and short rundowns on whats going on in Nouns.

Name: Nouns Origin Post
Description: 4156 references his original post about Nouns on X.com (Twitter) as the white paper and original call-to-action to starting Nouns.

Name: Writings from Benjamin Lasko
Description: Thoughts from community member Benjamin Latsko, Creative leader, the brains behind Nouns Town, and many other fun ideas.

Name: Gnars Community Blog
Description: Gnars, a Nounish sub-community, has a blog they produce sharing content and gnarly news across the from across the Nouns ecosystem.

Name: Builder DAO Community Blog
Description: Builder DAO has a blog they produce highlighting stories and achievements from across the nouns.build ecosystem including many Nounish sub-DAOs.
